name: Demeo Battles
abstract: Demeo Battles is a competitive turn-based strategy game for 1-4 players. Choose your champion, assemble an army of monstrous minions & team up with another champion in your quest for turn-based glory!

detail.app_languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
- Solved issue with position of the arena geometry intersecting with the character selection box/shop.
- Experience and keys are now awarded for all match types.
- Improved information shown when queueing for a Quickplay session.
- Updated UI for various game areas, including adding clearer UI to Hero Select and the Shop when one player is controlling both heroes.
- AI controlled heroes have had numerous bug fixes that caused them to break the rules of the game.
- AI controlled heroes have received improved AI for targeting board pieces as well as certain cards so they use their actions more sensibly.
- Numerous fixes to the Slime Fusion AI.
- Fixed bug that made stealth effects on AI players not function visually at all.
- Minor spelling and grammar tweaks.

name: Snow Fortress 2
abstract: Dive into a VR winter wonderland! Build your own icy fortresses, engage in epic snowball battles, and defend your village from an army menacing snowmen. Stay Frosty!

Fix to multiplayer connection
Fix to snow block spawning

name: Draconite
abstract:
Build weapons with a modular gun crafting system.
Fight waves of Kayoos across multiple levels.
Raise your pet dragons to help you.

detail.app_release_note:
Trick or treat! Halloween is near!
The new Halloween update is here!

Patch note :

Added
- Added an Halloween event which changes the hub and the hub's music
- Added Halloween decorations on the player's platform
- Added a new bat bobblehead
- Added pause menu activation when headset enter sleep mode to prevent the game from resuming instantly
- Added crystal hit sound feedback when it takes damage
- Added possibility to shred any blocks

Changed
- UIs text now have a small drop shadow to help with readability
- UIs have been resized to better fit on screen when looking forward
- Reduced shredder sound
- Weapons destruction is quicker when falling off platform

Fixed
- Fixed laser weapon bugging when fired on a dying enemy
- Fixed leaderboards loading time
- Fixed blocks disappearing when connecting to one another which caused a crash
- Fixed sound desync on some UIs
- Fixed typos
- Fixed object cards animation on unlocked elements
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link
